name: ListDashboardTemplates
description:
Retrieve a list of dashboard templates for a project.

Use this tool to get all available dashboard templates within a specified project. It's useful for identifying templates you can use to set up dashboards in your project.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the specific project for which you want to retrieve dashboard templates. This ID can be obtained by calling the `/api/projects/` endpoint.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of dashboard templates to return per page.

value_schema.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: starting_index_for_results
parameters.description: The index from which to start returning results, useful for pagination.

value_schema.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

value_schema.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

value_schema.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
